name: Rogue
description: A roguish kenku lurking in the shadows holds a dagger, poised to strike. This card suggests treachery and deception.

person.upright: A deceptive person hiding a sinister secret; pursuit of their own aims trumps any friendship or loyalty.
person.reverse: A good-hearted person entangled in a criminal or evil organization who is desperate for a way out.

creatureTrap.upright: A dangerous creature that strikes by surprise or from darkness.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature unwillingly bound to the service of villains.

place.upright: A front for a criminal operation, or a monster's lair.
place.reverse: An oasis of compassion surrounded by violence.

treasure.upright: A treasure that hides a deadly secret, such as a ring with a spring-loaded poison needle, a Dagger of Venom, or a cursed magic item.
treasure.reverse: A treasure caked in grime or hidden in a filthy place.

situation.upright: A situation rooted in or destined for betrayal.
situation.reverse: Good characters who are part of an evil organization or who plot to subvert it.
